name: NASA Now
description: A site that displays a bunch of NASA pictures and information such as the Astronomy Picture of the Day, Images and Articles from the NASA database, Space Weather, and the latest pictures of Earth.

name: Triviatastic!
description: A trivia website powered by the OpenTriviaDB API with saved highscores!

name: Rune Generator
description: A generator for creating rune like symbols using point relations and specified possible lines in Python 3.

name: password_generator
description: A simple webpage that allows the user to generate new (and generally secure) passwords

name: day_planner
description: A quick day planner web page.

name: readme_generator
description: A command line tool to generate README.md files

name: employee_db
description: A command line tool to interact with a MYSQL database of employees

name: team_profile_generator
description: A command line tool to generate a webpage based upon inputting in employee or team member information

name: Code Quiz
description: A small javascript quiz webpage.  Stores the highscores to local storage.
